artview.plugins.DealiasUnwrapPhase¶

class artview.plugins.DealiasUnwrapPhase(Vradar=None, Vgatefilter=None, name='DealiasUnwrapPhase', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Interfase for executing pyart.correct.dealias_unwrap_phase

__init__(Vradar=None, Vgatefilter=None, name='DealiasUnwrapPhase', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface

Parameters :

[Optional] :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

Vgatefilter : Variable instance

Gatefilter signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable. [Not Implemented]

name : string

Field Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.

Methods

DealiasUnwrapPhase.addGeneralOptions() Mount Options Layout
DealiasUnwrapPhase.chooseRadar() Get Radar with VariableChoose
DealiasUnwrapPhase.dealias_unwrap_phase() Mount Options and execute dealias_unwrap_phase.
DealiasUnwrapPhase.displayHelp() Display pyart’s docstring for help
DealiasUnwrapPhase.guiStart([parent]) Grafical Interface for Starting this Class
DealiasUnwrapPhase.newRadar(variable, value, ...) respond to change in radar
